content:
Do you really need to chat with me every time you see me today?
Are you fond of me, or just fond of chatting?
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-1008热贝尔_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I don't like getting caught up in endless chatter...
{短暂停}But, seeing as it's you,
I guess I can talk a bit more.
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-1008热贝尔_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
"Hmm hmm~ Dig a hole, pat the soil,
Count from one to five with joy~"
Hm? Looking for me? Today again... no wait, yet again?
info: 特殊反馈-短时间内第八次对话-1008热贝尔_特殊反馈及引入语
